In environment p, n1, r1, n2, r2 : nat H : p <> 0 H0 : n1 * p + r1 = n2 * p + r2 H1 : r1 < p H2 : r2 < p Unable to unify "r2 < p" with "p * n1 + r1 = p * n2 + r2".

original: intros r2 n2 r1 n1 p H1 H2 H3 H4. intros Hneq Hsum Hlt1 Hlt2. apply Nat.div_mod_unique with (b:=p) (q1:=n1) (q2:=n2) (r1:=r1) (r2:=r2). - apply Hlt1. - apply Hlt2. - apply H2.
